text: Micha Lindenstrauss (; 28 June 1937 - 2 May 2019) was a German-born Israeli judge. He was born in Berlin, but moved to Israel before World War II. Lindenstrauss was the State Comptroller between 2005 and 2012. In the Israel Defense Forces, he was a military prosecutor, and later, as a judge in a military tribunal.
